markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Inured to the Heat](/Feats.aspx?ID=2836) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Shisk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=382" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Mwangi Expanse](/Sources.aspx?ID=89) pg. 124 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your have a love for extreme heat. You gain resistance 4 to [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72). You treat [environmental heat effects](/Rules.aspx?ID=642) as if they were one step less extreme (incredible heat becomes extreme, extreme heat becomes severe, and so on).
name: Inured to the Heat
